content.question: ​A certain hobby shop wants to attract customers on slow sales days by offering a new discount. The shop offers a <math alttext="1.5 percent sign"><semantics><mrow><mn>1.5</mn><mo>%</mo></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> discount on Wednesdays with an added bonus for repeat customers. For customers who make purchases on successive Wednesdays, their discount is doubled from the previous Wednesday. For example, a certain customer makes purchases on three successive Wednesdays and receives <math alttext="1.5 percent sign"><semantics><mrow><mn>1.5</mn><mo>%</mo></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> (week <math alttext="1"><semantics><mn>1</mn><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>), <math alttext="3 percent sign"><semantics><mrow><mn>3</mn><mo>%</mo></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> (week <math alttext="2"><semantics><mn>2</mn><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>), and <math alttext="6 percent sign"><semantics><mrow><mn>6</mn><mo>%</mo></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> (week <math alttext="3"><semantics><mn>3</mn><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>) discounts on those three Wednesdays. Based on this pattern, what is the first successive week that a customer’s discount would exceed the purchase price of an item?
